lead_paragraph: Bo Horvat scored his second goal of the game with 1:06 left to give the Vancouver Canucks a 3-2 victory over the Carolina Hurricanes on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Horvat Scores Twice, Canucks Beat Hurricanes 3-2
headline.print_headline: Horvat Scores Twice, Canucks Beat Hurricanes 3-2
